DOC.brief_summary: Recent controversy arisen regard use pill cycle plan GnRH antagonist IVF cycle . The investigator perform study compare protocol gold-standard still today , long-agonist protocol previous use pill .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Contraceptive Pill GnRH Antagonist Versus Long Protocol IVF Patients
DOC.criteria: 1st 2nd IVF cycle BMI < 30 kg/m2 regular menstrual cycle basal FSH < 10 IU E2 < 60 pg/ml Polycystic ovary endometriosis previous ovarian surgery previous low ovarian response
